11.text: The Indian national cricket team will arrive in Sri Lanka today for a three-week-tour. The players ………………………. (welcome) by the President of the Sri Lanka Cricket Board at the Bandaranaike International Airport. During the tour, the two teams will play one test match and three one days. Matches ……………………… (hold) in Colombo, Galle and Pallekele. Virat Kohli will captain the Indian team while Sri Lanka ………………… (lead) by Angelo Mathews. Tickets ……………….. (sell) at the Sri Lanka Cricket head office from tomorrow. All the matches ………………………. (telecast) live on Rupavahini.
